Title: Hail Barry
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), David Guarascio, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (executive story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Barry joins the football team but is quickly benched by Coach Mellor due to his lack of playing ability. He convinces himself the coach is testing him; but when Barry realizes the truth of ...
